item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - L'Arc-en-Ciel ARENA TOUR 2024 UNDERGROUND - LIVE VIEWING JAPAN
item.description:
Hello everyone! , I need help,
I need a capper who can record the satellite signal of a concert that is going to be live broadcast in all cinemas of Japan.

In total It's 2 days, both days will be live broadcast

The events day is:

DAY 1 : 2024.04.13 / START: 17:00 (JAPAN TIME)
DAY 2 : 2024.04.14 / START: 16:00 (JAPAN TIME)

more info here: https://liveviewing.jp/larc-underground/

Thank you very much for help.
item.author: akiraciel
